There are app updates.
Please wait until the update is complete.

Update completed.
Palm app will be restarted.

Auth.ConfirmSeedMessage:
To make sure you’ve kept your
seed phrase, please choose and fill them.
Auth.CompleteMessage:
Wallet information is as follows.
You can check it later on My Page.
Auth.PalmToS:
· Click to sign in and accept the Palm Terms of Service.
· This request will not trigger a blockchain
  transaction or cost any gas fees.
· Your authentication status will reset after 24
  hours.
Auth.CopySeedPhraseMessage:
Keep the seed phrase in a safe place.
It will allow you to recover your wallet.
Auth.CopySeedPhraseNotice:
Notice that your generated wallet's Privatekey is not stored on the
server and is stored on your mobile device.
Auth.CopySeed: Copy the Set of Seed Phrase
Auth.CopySeedErrorToast: You must copy the seed phrase to proceed to the next step.
Auth.RecoverSeedVerifyPassToast: Verified your key or seed phrase.
Auth.RecoverSeedVerifyFailToast: Verification failed. please check you private key or seed phrase.
Auth.RecoverImportWalletTitle:
How do you
import your wallet?
Auth.RecoverRestoreWalletMessage:
The account can only be restored
by verifying the wallet.
Auth.RecoverResetPinMessage:
The PINcode can only be reset
by verifyng the wallet.
